rt

Interface Material

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Diffuse

    public interface Material
    Materials implement functionality for shading surfaces using their BRDFs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Spectrum evaluateBRDF(HitRecord hitRecord, javax.vecmath.Vector3f wOut, javax.vecmath.Vector3f wIn)
      Evaluate BRDF for pair of incoming and outgoing directions.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluateBRDF

        Spectrum evaluateBRDF(HitRecord hitRecord,
                    javax.vecmath.Vector3f wOut,
                    javax.vecmath.Vector3f wIn)
        Evaluate BRDF for pair of incoming and outgoing directions.
        Parameters:
        hitRecord - Information about hit point
        wOut - Outgoing direction, normalized and pointing away from the surface
        wIn - Incoming direction, normalized and pointing away from the surface
        Returns:
        BRDF value
